content:
Found this in my inbox; perhaps of interest to some here:

Petri Nets 2020
http://conf-2020.petrinet.net
41st International Conference on Application and Theory of Petri Nets and Concurrency
Virtual conference, June 24-25, 2020

Website says it's free and virtual, also has details of program and schedule.
Nice! But the program is already scheduled? Darn!
You'll have to wait for the 42nd to submit, I guess ;-)
NNNNNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOO! Every year I remember about this conference like one week before it starts and it's too late to submit! It already happened twice! T_____T
